abstract: Pfizer will reorganize its businesses and close several manufacturing and research sites, including a plant in Brooklyn, the borough where the drug company began.
snippet: Pfizer will reorganize its businesses and close several manufacturing and research sites, including a plant in Brooklyn, the borough where the drug company began.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer said yesterday that it would cut 7,800 workers, close several manufacturing and research sites and overhaul its business practices in hopes of coping with competition from cheaper generic drugs and setbacks in developing new products.

headline.main: Pfizer, Hurt by Rival Drugs, Will Lay Off 7,800
headline.print_headline: Pfizer, Hurt by Rival Generic Drugs, Will Lay Off 7,800

abstract: Pfizer is phasing out its manufacturing plant in Brooklyn, on the same Flushing Avenue site where the company was founded in 1849.
snippet: Pfizer is phasing out its manufacturing plant in Brooklyn, on the same Flushing Avenue site where the company was founded in 1849.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer is closing the plant in the borough where it was born.

headline.main: Shutting Doors Where a Drug-Making Giant Began
headline.print_headline: Shutting Doors Where a Drug-Making Giant Began

byline.original: By Ann Farmer and Nick Bunkley
